snippet: A federal judge in Boston on Tuesday ordered the Massachusetts Department of Correction to provide an inmate with a sex change.
abstract: Federal Judge Mark L Wolf orders the Massachusetts Department of Correction to provide inmate Michelle L Kosilek with a sex change; doctors for Kosilek, a transsexual who was convicted of murdering his wife in 1990, say gender reassignment surgery is the only way to treat his severe gender identity disorder.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge in Boston on Tuesday ordered the Massachusetts Department of Correction to provide an inmate with a sex change.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Sex Change Is Ordered for Inmate
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Sex Change Is Ordered For Inmate
